alert.note: Alert for Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 9:38PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central El Paso County through 1015 PM MDT... At 938 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Peyton, or 18 miles northeast of Colorado Springs, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Peyton and Black Forest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM MDT for east central Colorado.

area.areaDesc: Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft
